name: Lioden After Dark
description: A night theme for Lioden that's actually dark
additional_info:
An adapted version of Blackthorn's CSS, this takes the colors of the existing official night theme background and makes the site suited for eye-friendly browsing.

5/27/2018 - updated CSS for modbox mod text and new random lion/user feature
10/13/2018 - updated to account for dropdown menus in new Trading Center UI
2/8/2019 - updated for Claim button accessibility and new chat box
